bill_title: Honoring Hunter Paulsen, a senior at Elk Point-Jefferson High School, for his outstanding accomplishments in the sport of cross country.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring Hunter Paulsen, a senior at Elk Point-Jefferson High School, for his outstanding accomplishments in the sport of cross country. WHEREAS, Hunter Paulsen, as a sophomore at Elk Point-Jefferson High School, qualified for the state cross country meet and finished in fourteenth place, and, as a junior in high school, qualified for the state meet again and finished in eighth place; and WHEREAS, as a high school senior, Hunter finished his cross country career by winning the 2014 Class A Boys Cross Country Championship, and he is the first athlete from Elk Point-Jefferson High School to win an individual state championship in cross country; and WHEREAS, Hunter, throughout his years in cross country, placed high in a variety of conference and regional competitions and is a fine student and a role model for young student athletes in the Elk Point-Jefferson School District: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Ninetieth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the Legislature hereby honors and congratulates Hunter Paulsen for his outstanding accomplishments in the sport of cross country and wishes him much success in future endeavors.

A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring Hunter Paulsen, a senior at Elk Point-Jefferson High School, for his outstanding accomplishments in the sport of cross country. WHEREAS, Hunter Paulsen, as a sophomore at Elk Point-Jefferson High School, qualified for the state cross country meet and finished in fourteenth place, and, as a junior in high school, qualified for the state meet again and finished in eighth place; and WHEREAS, as a high school senior, Hunter finished his cross country career by winning the 2014 Class A Boys Cross Country Championship, and he is the first athlete from Elk Point-Jefferson High School to win an individual state championship in cross country; and WHEREAS, Hunter, throughout his years in cross country, placed high in a variety of conference and regional competitions and is a fine student and a role model for young student athletes in the Elk Point-Jefferson School District: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Ninetieth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the Legislature hereby honors and congratulates Hunter Paulsen for his outstanding accomplishments in the sport of cross country and wishes him much success in future endeavors. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.015 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
